files.name: README.sv.md
files.content:
[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/rich/month)](https://pepy.tech/project/rich)
[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/rich.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/rich)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/Textualize/rich/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/Textualize/rich)
[![Rich blog](https://img.shields.io/badge/blog-rich%20news-yellowgreen)](https://www.willmcgugan.com/tag/rich/)
[![Twitter Follow](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/willmcgugan.svg?style=social)](https://twitter.com/willmcgugan)

![Logo](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logo.svg)

[English readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.cn.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.zh-tw.md)
  [Lengua espaola readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.es.md)
  [Deutsche readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.de.md)
  [Ls p svenska](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.sv.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.ja.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.kr.md)
  [Franais readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.fr.md)
  [Schwizerdtsch readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.de-ch.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.hi.md)
  [Portugus brasileiro readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.pt-br.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.ru.md)
   [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.fa.md)
  [Trke readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.tr.md)
  [Polskie readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.pl.md)

Rich r ett Python bibliotek fr _rich_ text och vacker formattering i terminalen.

[Rich API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) gr det enkelt att lgga till frg och stil till terminal utmatning. Rich kan ocks framstlla fina tabeller, framstegsflt, mrksprk, syntaxmarkerad kllkod, tillbaka-sprning, och mera - redo att anvnda.

![Funktioner](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/features.png)

Fr en video demonstration av Rich kolla [calmcode.io](https://calmcode.io/rich/introduction.html) av [@fishnets88](https://twitter.com/fishnets88).

Se vad [folk pratar om Rich](https://www.willmcgugan.com/blog/pages/post/rich-tweets/).

## Kompatibilitet

Rich funkar med Linux, OSX, och Windows. Sann frg / emoji funkar med nya Windows Terminalen, klassiska terminal r begrnsad till 8 frger. Rich krver Python 3.6.3 eller senare.

Rich funkar med [Jupyter notebooks](https://jupyter.org/) utan ngon ytterligare konfiguration behvd.

## Installering

Installera med `pip` eller din favorita PyPI packet hanterare.

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```

Kr fljade fljande fr att testa Rich utmatning i din terminal:

```sh
python -m rich
```

## Rich utskrivningsfunktion

Fr att enkelt lgga till rich utmatning i din applikation, kan du importera [rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start) metoden, vilket har den samma signatur som den inbyggda Python funktionen. Testa detta:

```python
from rich import print

print("Hello, [bold magenta]World[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/print.png)

## Rich REPL

Rich kan installeras i Python REPL, s att varje datastruktur kommer att skrivas ut fint och markeras.

```python
>>> from rich import pretty
>>> pretty.install()
```

![REPL](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/repl.png)

## Anvndning av konsolen

Fr mer kontroll ver rich terminal innehllsutmatning, importera och konstruera ett [Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console) objekt.

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
```

`Console` objektet har en `print` metod vilket har ett avsiktligt liknande grnssnitt till den inbyggda `print` funktionen. Hr r ett exempel av anvndningen:

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!")
```

Som du mjligtvis anar, detta kommer skriva ut `"Hello World!"` till terminalen. Notera att till skillnad frn den inbyggda `print` funktionen, Rich kommer att radbryta din text s att den passar inom terminalbredden.

Det finns ett par stt att lgga till frg och stil till din utmatning. Du kan stta en stil fr hela utmatningen genom att addera ett `style` nyckelord argument. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
console.print("Hello", "World!", style="bold red")
```

Utmatningen kommer bli ngot liknande:

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/hello_world.png)

Det r bra fr att ge stil till en textrad t gngen. Fr mer finkornad stilisering, Rich framstller en speciell mrksprk vilket liknar [bbcode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode) i syntax. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
console.print("Where there is a [bold cyan]Will[/bold cyan] there [u]is[/u] a [i]way[/i].")
```

![Konsol mrksprk](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/where_there_is_a_will.png)

Du kan anvnda ett `Console` objekt fr att generera sofistikerad utmatning med minimal anstrngning. Se [Console API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/console.html) dokument fr detaljer.

## Rich Inspektera

Rich har en [inspektionsfunktion](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html?highlight=inspect#rich.inspect) som kan producera en rapport om vilket Python objekt som helst, till exempel klass, instans, eller inbyggt.

```python
>>> my_list = ["foo", "bar"]
>>> from rich import inspect
>>> inspect(my_list, methods=True)
```

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/inspect.png)

See [inspektionsdokumentationen](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html#rich.inspect) fr detaljer.

# Rich Library

Rich innehller ett antal av inbyggda _renderables_ som du kan anvnda fr att skapa elegant utmatning i din kommandotolk och hjlpa dig felska din kod.

Klicka p fljande rubriker fr detaljer:

<details>
<summary>Logga</summary>

`Console` objektet har en `log()` metod vilket har liknande grnssnitt som `print()`, men framstller ven en kolumn fr den nuvarande tid och fil samt rad vilket gjorde anroppet. Som standard kommer Rich att markera syntax fr Python strukturer och fr repr strngar. Ifall du loggar en samling (det vill sga en ordbok eller en lista) kommer Rich att finskriva ut det s att det passar i det tillgngliga utrymme. Hr r ett exempel av dessa funktioner.

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

Det ovanstende har fljande utmatning:

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/log.png)

Notera `log_locals` argumentet, vilket utmatar en tabell innehllandes de lokala variablerna varifrn log metoden kallades frn.

Log metoden kan anvndas fr att logga till terminal fr lngkrande applikationer s som servrar, men r ocks en vldigt bra felskningsverktyg.

</details>
<details>
<summary>Loggningshanterare</summary>

Du kan ocks anvnda den inbyggda [Handler klassen](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/logging.html) fr att formatera och frglgga utmatningen frn Pythons loggningsmodul. Hr r ett exempel av utmatningen:

![Loggning](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logging.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Emoji</summary>

Fr att infoga en emoji till konsolutmatningen placera namnet mellan tv kolon. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
>>> console.print(":smiley: :vampire: :pile_of_poo: :thumbs_up: :raccoon:")
    
```

Vnligen anvnd denna funktion klokt.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tabeller</summary>

Rich kan framstlla flexibla [tabeller](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tables.html) med unicode boxkaraktrer. Det finns en stor mngd av formateringsalternativ fr grnser, stilar, och celljustering etc.

![Tabell film](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table_movie.gif)

Animationen ovan genererades utav [table_movie.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/table_movie.py) i exempelkatalogen.

Hr r ett exempel av en enklare tabell:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")
table.add_column("Date", style="dim", width=12)
table.add_column("Title")
table.add_column("Production Budget", justify="right")
table.add_column("Box Office", justify="right")
table.add_row(
    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)
table.add_row(
    "May 25, 2018",
    "[red]Solo[/red]: A Star Wars Story",
    "$275,000,000",
    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",
    "Star Wars Ep. VIII: The Last Jedi",
    "$262,000,000",
    "[bold]$1,332,539,889[/bold]",
)

console.print(table)
```

Detta producerar fljande utmatning:

![tabell](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table.png)

Notera att konsol mrksprk r framstllt p samma stt som `print()` och `log()`. I sjlva verket, vad som helst som r framstllt av Rich kan inkluderas i rubriker / rader (ven andra tabeller).

`Table` klassen r smart nog att storleksndra kolumner att passa den tillgngliga bredden av terminalen, och slr in text ifall det behvs. Hr r samma exempel, med terminalen gjord mindre n tabell ovan:

![tabell2](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table2.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Framstegsflt</summary>

Rich kan framstlla flera flimmerfria [framstegsflt](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/progress.html) fr att flja lngvariga uppgifter.

Fr grundlggande anvndning, sl in valfri sekvens i `track` funktion och iterera ver resultatet. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
from rich.progress import track

for step in track(range(100)):
    do_step(step)
```

Det r inte mycket svrare att lgga till flera framstegsflt. Hr r ett exempel tagen frn dokumentationen:

![framsteg](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/progress.gif)

Dessa kolumner kan konfigureras att visa vilka detaljer du vill. Inbyggda kolumner inkluderar procentuell frdig, filstorlek, filhastighet, och terstende tid. Hr r nnu ett exempel som visar en pgende nedladdning:

![framsteg](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/downloader.gif)

Fr att sjlv testa detta, kolla [examples/downloader.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/downloader.py) vilket kan ladda ner flera URLs samtidigt medan visar framsteg.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Status</summary>

Fr situationer dr det r svrt att berkna framsteg, kan du anvnda [status](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) metoden vilket kommer visa en 'snurra' animation och meddelande. Animationen hindrar dig inte frn att anvnda konsolen som normalt. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

Detta genererar fljande utmatning i terminalen.

![status](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/status.gif)

Snurra animationen r lnad ifrn [cli-spinners](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cli-spinners). Du kan vlja en snurra genom att specifiera `spinner` parametern. Kr fljande kommando fr att se tillgngliga vrden:

```
python -m rich.spinner
```

Kommandot ovan genererar fljande utmatning i terminalen:

![Snurror](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/spinners.gif)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Trd</summary>

Rich kan framstlla ett [trd](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tree.html) med riktlinjer. Ett trd r idealt fr att visa en filstruktur, eller andra hierarkiska data.

Etiketter p trdet kan vara enkelt text eller ngot annat som Rich kan framstlla. Kr fljande fr en demonstration:

```
python -m rich.tree
```

Detta genererar fljande utmatning:

![mrksprk](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/tree.png)

Se [tree.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/tree.py) exemplet fr ett skript som visar en trdvy av vilken katalog som helst, som liknar linux `tree` kommandot.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Kolumner</summary>

Rich kan framstlla innehll i prydliga [kolumner](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/columns.html) med lika eller optimal bredd. Hr r en grundlggande klon av (MacOS / Linux) `ls` kommandot vilket visar en kataloglista i kolumner:

```python
import os
import sys

from rich import print
from rich.columns import Columns

directory = os.listdir(sys.argv[1])
print(Columns(directory))
```

Fljande skrmdump r resultatet frn [kolumner exempelet](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/columns.py) vilket visar data tagen frn ett API i kolumner:

![kolumner](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/columns.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Mrksprk</summary>

Rich kan framstlla [mrksprk](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markdown.html) och gr ett rimligt jobb med att verstta formateringen till terminalen.

Fr att framstlla mrksprk importera `Markdown` klassen och konstruera den med en strng innehllandes mrksprkskod. Mata sedan ut det till konsolen. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.markdown import Markdown

console = Console()
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```

Detta kommer att producera utmatning som liknar fljande:

![mrksprk](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Syntaxmarkering</summary>

Rich anvnder [pygments](https://pygments.org/) biblioteket fr att implementera [syntax markering](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html). Anvndningen r liknande till framstlla mrksprk; konstruera ett `Syntax` objekt och skriv ut den till konsolen. Hr r ett exempel:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```

Detta kommer producera fljande utmatning:

![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tillbaka-sprning</summary>

Rich kan framstlla [vackra tillbaka-sprningar](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/traceback.html) vilket r enklare att lsa och visar mer kod n vanliga Python tillbaka-sprningar. Du kan stta Rich som standard tillbaka-sprningshanterare s att alla ofngade undantag kommer att framstllas av Rich.

S hr ser det ut p OSX (liknande p Linux):

![traceback](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/traceback.png)

</details>

Alla Rich framstllsbara anvnder sig av [konsolprotokollet](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol.html), som du ocks kan anvnda fr att implementera ditt eget Rich-innehll.

# Rich fr fretag

Tillgnglig som en del av Tidelift-prenumerationen.

Underhllarna av Rich och tusentals andra paket arbetar med Tidelift fr att leverera kommersiellt std och underhll fr de ppen kllkodspaket som du kan anvnda fr att bygga dina applikationer. Spara tid, reducera risk, och frbttra kodhlsan, samtidigt som du betalar underhllarna fr exakt de paket du anvnder [Lr dig mer.](https://tidelift.com/subscription/pkg/pypi-rich?utm_source=pypi-rich&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=enterprise&utm_term=repo)

# Projekt som anvnder sig av Rich

Hr r ett par projekt som anvnder Rich:

- [BrancoLab/BrainRender](https://github.com/BrancoLab/BrainRender)
  ett python packet fr visualisering av tredimensionell neuro-anatomiska data
- [Ciphey/Ciphey](https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey)
  Automatiserat dekrypteringsverktyg
- [emeryberger/scalene](https://github.com/emeryberger/scalene)
  en hgpresterande processor med hg precision och minnesprofilerare fr Python
- [hedythedev/StarCli](https://github.com/hedythedev/starcli)
  Blddra bland trendande projekt i Github frn din kommandotolk
- [intel/cve-bin-tool](https://github.com/intel/cve-bin-tool)
  Detta verktyg skannar efter vanliga, srbara komponenter (openssl, libpng, libxml2, expat och en del andra) fr att lta dig veta ifall ditt system inkluderar vanliga bibliotek med knda srbarheter.
- [nf-core/tools](https://github.com/nf-core/tools)
  Python packet med hjlpverktyg fr nf-core gemenskapen.
- [cansarigol/pdbr](https://github.com/cansarigol/pdbr)
  pdb + Rich bibliotek fr frbttrad felskning.
- [plant99/felicette](https://github.com/plant99/felicette)
  Satellitbilder fr nybrjare.
- [seleniumbase/SeleniumBase](https://github.com/seleniumbase/SeleniumBase)
  Automatisera & testa 10x snabbare med Selenium & pytest. Batterier inkluderat.
- [smacke/ffsubsync](https://github.com/smacke/ffsubsync)
  Automagiskt synkronisera undertexter med video.
- [tryolabs/norfair](https://github.com/tryolabs/norfair)
  Lttvikt Python bibliotek fr att addera 2d-objektsprning i realtid till vilken detektor som helst.
- [ansible/ansible-lint](https://github.com/ansible/ansible-lint) Ansible-lint kontroller playbooks fr dess metoder och beteenden som potentiellt kan frbttras
- [ansible-community/molecule](https://github.com/ansible-community/molecule) Ansible Molecule ramverk fr testning
- +[Many more](https://github.com/textualize/rich/network/dependents)!

files.name: README.tr.md
files.content:
[![Supported Python Versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/rich/13.2.0)](https://pypi.org/project/rich/) [![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/rich.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/rich)

[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/rich/month)](https://pepy.tech/project/rich)
[![codecov](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/Textualize/rich?label=codecov&logo=codecov)](https://codecov.io/gh/Textualize/rich)
[![Rich blog](https://img.shields.io/badge/blog-rich%20news-yellowgreen)](https://www.willmcgugan.com/tag/rich/)
[![Twitter Follow](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/willmcgugan.svg?style=social)](https://twitter.com/willmcgugan)

![Logo](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logo.svg)

[English readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.cn.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.zh-tw.md)
  [Lengua espaola readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.es.md)
  [Deutsche readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.de.md)
  [Ls p svenska](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.sv.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.ja.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.kr.md)
  [Franais readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.fr.md)
  [Schwizerdtsch readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.de-ch.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.hi.md)
  [Portugus brasileiro readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.pt-br.md)
  [Italian readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.it.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.ru.md)
  [Indonesian readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.id.md)
  [ readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.fa.md)
  [Trke readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.tr.md)
  [Polskie readme](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/README.pl.md)


Bir Python ktphanesi olan __rich__, terminal zerinde gsterili ktlar almanz salayan bir aratr.

[Rich API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) kullanarak terminal ktlarnza stil ekleyebilir ve renklendirebilirsiniz. Ayn zamanda tablolar, ilerleme ubuklarn, markdown stillerini, kaynak koddaki sz dizimi gsterimlerini ve bir ok eyi rich kullanarak yapabilirsiniz.

![Features](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/features.png)

Rich'e video ile gz atmak iin [@fishnets88](https://twitter.com/fishnets88) tarafndan oluturulan [calmcode.io](https://calmcode.io/rich/introduction.html) sitesine bakabilirsiniz.

nsanlarn [rich hakknda yazdklar son yazlar](https://www.willmcgugan.com/blog/pages/post/rich-tweets).

## Uyumluluk

Rich Linux, OSX ve Windows zerinde alabilir. Windows'un yeni terminalinde de doru bir ekilde alabilir, eski terminalde 16 renk olduu iin istenilen sonular elde edilemeyebilir. Ayn zamanda Rich'in alabilmesi iin ortamda minimum Python 3.6.3 veya daha yeni bir srm olmas gerekmektedir.

Rich [Jupyter notebook](https://jupyter.org/) zerinde hi bir ek ykleme gerektirmeden alabilir.

## Ykleme

`pip` zerinden veya kullanm olduunuz PyPI paket yneticiniz zerinden indirebilirsiniz.

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```

Aadaki komut satrn altrarak ktnz terminal zerinden grebilirsiniz.


```sh
python -m rich
```

## Rich Print

[rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start) methodunu ykleyerek, Rich'i kullanmaya balayabilirsiniz.

```python
from rich import print

print("Merhaba, [bold magenta]Dnya[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

Buradaki yazy deitiremediim iin siz hello world olarak gryorsunuz. :D
![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/print.png)

## Rich REPL

Rich Python REPL ierisine yklenebilir, bylece herhangi bir veri tipini gzelce terminal kts olarak verebilir.

```python
>>> from rich import pretty
>>> pretty.install()
```

![REPL](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/repl.png)

## Terminali Nasl Kullanlr?

ktlarnz zerinde daha fazla hakimiyet kurmak isterseniz, [Console](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console)'u import edip objesini kullanabilirsiniz.

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
```

Console objesi tpk Python ierisinde hazr gelen `print` methoduna benziyor, tabii daha fazlas da var.
Kullanm aadaki rnek gibi olacaktr:

```python
console.print("Merhaba", "Dnya!")
```

Sizin de tahmin edebileceiniz gibi terminal ktmz `"Merhaba Dnya!"` olacaktr. Standart `print` fonksiyonundan farkl olarak Console `print` fonksiyonu terminale smayan yazlar kaydrma zelliine sahiptir.

Yazlarmza birden fazla ekilde renk ekleyebiliriz. Bunlardan ek basit olan ekli, `style` argmanna rengimizi vermek. Aada nasl kullanlacana dair bir rnek bulabilirsiniz.

```python
console.print("Merhaba", "Dnya!", style="bold red")
```

Eer kty deitirmeseydim aadaki gibi bir grnt ile karlaacaktnz:

![Hello World](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/hello_world.png)

Tek seferde bir yazy renklendirmek iin kullanl bir yntem olsa da, eer ktmzn sadece belirli blgelerinde deiiklik yapacaksak [bbcode](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode) sz dizimini kullanmalyz. Bunun iin de bir rnek:

```python
console.print("[bold red]Mustafa Kemal Atatrk[/bold red] [u](1881 - 10 Kasm 1938)[/u], [i]Trk asker ve devlet adamdr[/i]. [bold cyan]Trk Kurtulu Sava'nn bakomutan ve Trkiye Cumhuriyeti'nin kurucusudur[/bold cyan].")
```

![Console Markup](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/where_there_is_a_will.png)

Console objesini kullanarak sofistike bir ok kty minimum efor ile oluturabilirsiniz. [Console API](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/console.html) dkmanna gz atarak daha fazla bilgi elde edebilirsiniz.

## Rich Inspect

Rich [inspect](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html?highlight=inspect#rich.inspect) adnda bir fonksiyona sahiptir ve bu fonksiyon bize bir Python objesininin zelliklerini gsterir.

```python
>>> my_list = ["foo", "bar"]
>>> from rich import inspect
>>> inspect(my_list, methods=True)
```

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/inspect.png)

[Bu dkmana](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/init.html#rich.inspect) gz atarak daha fazla bilgi elde edebilirsiniz...

# Rich Ktphaneleri

Rich ierisinde terminal zerinde kullandnzda ktlarnz gsterili klacak ok fazla yapya sahiptir.

Bu yaplarn detaylar iin ilgili balklara tklayn:

<details>
<summary>Log</summary>

Console objesi ierisinde `log()` methodunu barndrr, bu tpk `print()` methodu gibi davranr fakat buna ek olarak bastrld zaman da ekrana yanstr. Bu duruma ek olarak Rich Syntax Highlighting'de gerekletirir.
Aada rnek kod paras:

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

Ve bu kod parasnn kts:

![Log](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/log.png)

`log_locals` argman, local olarak bulunan deikenleri tablo olarak ekrana bastrr.

</details>
<details>
<summary>Logging Handler</summary>

Python'un logging modln de [Handler snf](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/logging.html) ile formatlayp renklendirebiliriz.

![Logging](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/logging.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Emoji</summary>

Emojileri de kullanabilirsiniz, kullanm markdown emojileri ile ayn.

```python
>>> console.print(":smiley: :vampire: :pile_of_poo: :thumbs_up: :raccoon:")
    
```

Bu zellii doru yerlerde kullanmakta fayda var tabii.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tables</summary>

Rich kullanclarna esnek bir [tablo](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tables.html) imkan sunar, birden fazla ekilde formatlayp, stillendirip kullanabilirsiniz.

![table movie](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table_movie.gif)

Yukardaki tablo rnei [table_movie.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/table_movie.py) rnek kodu ile oluturulmutur.

Basit bir tablo rnei:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")
table.add_column("Date", style="dim", width=12)
table.add_column("Title")
table.add_column("Production Budget", justify="right")
table.add_column("Box Office", justify="right")
table.add_row(
    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)
table.add_row(
    "May 25, 2018",
    "[red]Solo[/red]: A Star Wars Story",
    "$275,000,000",
    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",
    "Star Wars Ep. VIII: The Last Jedi",
    "$262,000,000",
    "[bold]$1,332,539,889[/bold]",
)

console.print(table)
```

Kodun kts aadaki gibi olmaktadr:

![table](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table.png)

Note that console markup is rendered in the same way as `print()` and `log()`. In fact, anything that is renderable by Rich may be included in the headers / rows (even other tables).

`Table` snf kendini terminal ekranna gre ayarlayabilir, geniletip, kltebilir. Burada bunun ile alakal bir rnek gryorsunuz.

![table2](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/table2.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Progress Bars</summary>

Uzun ilerinizi gstermek iin Rich size birden fazla [progress](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/progress.html) bar sunuyor.

Basit bir kullanm iin, herhangi bir admnz `track` fonksiyonu ile kapsayp dngye aln.

```python
from rich.progress import track

for step in track(range(100)):
    do_step(step)
```

Aadaki grsellerde de grlecei zere birden fazla kez progress bar kullanabilirsiniz, ve dkmandan da anlalaca zere bu hi de zor bir i deil.

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/progress.gif)

Kolonlar kullanc tarafndan ayarlanabilir, indirme hzn, dosya boyutunu yzdesel olarak gsterimi gibi bir ok ekilde gsterim salayabilir.

![progress](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/downloader.gif)

Eer siz de denemek isterseniz [examples/downloader.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/downloader.py) koduna bakarak ve altrarak indirme yapabilirsiniz.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Status</summary>

Eer hesaplamanz gereken uzun iler varsa ve bunu progress bar ile gsteremiyorsanz yardmnza [status](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) methodu yetiecektir.

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

Yukardaki kod parac aadaki gibi bir kt retecektir.

![status](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/status.gif)

Spin animasyonu [cli-spinners](https://www.npmjs.com/package/cli-spinners) ktphanesinden alnmtr. `spinner` parametresi ile seeceiniz spin ekilini kullanabilirsiniz. 

```
python -m rich.spinner
```

kts aadaki gibi bir sonu retecektir:

![spinners](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/spinners.gif)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tree</summary>

Rich bir [tree](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/tree.html) yapsn yardmc izgiler ile bastrabilir. Bu yap bir dosya yapsn gstermek iin veya hiyerarik veri yaplarn gstermek iin kullanlabilir.

Label yaps ise basit bir text veya Rich zerinde bastrlabilen her hangi bir yap olabilir.

```
python -m rich.tree
```

Kodun kartaca grnt u olacaktr:

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/tree.png)

[tree.py](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/tree.py) rnek dosyas ile linux'da bulunan `tree` kodunu rich zerinden simle edebilirsiniz.

</details>

<details>
<summary>Columns</summary>

Rich ierikleri [kolon](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/columns.html) olarak eit veya optimal aralklarla gsterebilir.

Burada basit bir `ls` klonunu gryorsunz.

```python
import os
import sys

from rich import print
from rich.columns import Columns

directory = os.listdir(sys.argv[1])
print(Columns(directory))
```

Yukardaki yapya [columns example](https://github.com/textualize/rich/blob/master/examples/columns.py) balants zerinden ulaabilirsiniz.

![columns](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/columns.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Markdown</summary>

Rich [markdown](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/markdown.html) stillerini ve evirme ilemlerini de ekranda gsterebilir.

Sadece yaplmas gereken `Markdown` snfn import edip, ieriini doldurup ekrana bastrmak.

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.markdown import Markdown

console = Console()
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```

Aadaki gibi bir ktya ulaacaz.

![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Syntax Highlighting</summary>

Rich ierisinde [syntax highlighting](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html) iin [pygments](https://pygments.org/) ktphanesini kullanyor. Tpk markdown'da olduu gibi, bir tane `Syntax` objesi oluturup bu objeyi terminale bastryoruz.
rnek:

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```

Yukardaki kod paras aadaki gibi bir kt retecektir.

![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary>Tracebacks</summary>

Rich sahip olduu gzel [traceback](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/traceback.html)'ler yaratabilir. Bylece daha okunabilir ve daha kolay anlalabilen bir yapya sahip olursunuz.

Burada OSX zerinde (tpk Linux gibi) bir traceback kts gryorsunuz.

![traceback](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/traceback.png)

</details>

Tm rich yaplar [Console Protocol](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/protocol.html) kullanlarak gerekletirilmitir, siz de kendi ieriinizi Rich'e aktarabilirsiniz.

# Rich CLI

Ayn zamanda [Rich CLI](https://github.com/textualize/rich-cli) uygulamasn da kontrol edin. Bu uygulama ile konsol ktlarnz renklendirebilir, kod ktlarnza syntax uygulayabilir, markdown gsterebilir, CSV dosyasn grntleyebilir ve daha bir ok ey yapabilirsiniz.


![Rich CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Textualize/rich-cli/main/imgs/rich-cli-splash.jpg)

# Textual

Rich'in karde projesi olan [Textual](https://github.com/Textualize/textual)'a da bir gz atn. Textual ile konsol ktlarnza bir UI oluturup, gruplayp grselletirebilirsiniz.

![Textual screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Textualize/textual/main/imgs/textual.png)

# Rich kullanlan Projeler

[Rich Galeri](https://www.textualize.io/rich/gallery)si zerinden, rich kullanlan son uygulamalara [Textualize.io](https://www.textualize.io) zerinden gz atabiirsiniz.

Eer siz de projenizi galeriye eklemek istiyorsanz [bu admlar](https://www.textualize.io/gallery-instructions) takip ederek ekleyebilirsiniz.

<!-- This is a test, no need to translate -->

```sh
python -m pip install rich
```


## Rich Print

 [rich print](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/introduction.html#quick-start)  rich rich print  Python 

```python
from rich import print

print("Hello, [bold magenta]World[/bold magenta]!", ":vampire:", locals())
```

```python
>>> pretty.install()
```

##  Console

```python
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()

```

```python
from rich.console import Console
console = Console()

test_data = [
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "sum", "params": [None, 1, 2, 4, False, True], "id": "1",},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "notify_hello", "params": [7]},
    {"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "subtract", "params": [42, 23], "id": "2"},
]

def test_log():
    enabled = False
    context = {
        "foo": "bar",
    }
    movies = ["Deadpool", "Rise of the Skywalker"]
    console.log("Hello from", console, "!")
    console.log(test_data, log_locals=True)


test_log()
```

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.table import Table

console = Console()

table = Table(show_header=True, header_style="bold magenta")

    "Dec 20, 2019", "Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker", "$275,000,000", "$375,126,118"
)

    "$393,151,347",
)
table.add_row(
    "Dec 15, 2017",

)

console.print(table)
```

<summary></summary>

 [status](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/console.html#rich.console.Console.status) spinner

```python
from time import sleep
from rich.console import Console

console = Console()
tasks = [f"task {n}" for n in range(1, 11)]

with console.status("[bold green]Working on tasks...") as status:
    while tasks:
        task = tasks.pop(0)
        sleep(1)
        console.log(f"{task} complete")
```

 `Markdown`  Markdown  console

```python
with open("README.md") as readme:
    markdown = Markdown(readme.read())
console.print(markdown)
```



![markdown](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/markdown.png)

</details>

<details>
<summary></summary>

Rich  [pygments](https://pygments.org/)  [](https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/syntax.html)  Markdown  `Syntax`  console

```python
from rich.console import Console
from rich.syntax import Syntax

my_code = '''
def iter_first_last(values: Iterable[T]) -> Iterable[Tuple[bool, bool, T]]:
    """Iterate and generate a tuple with a flag for first and last value."""
    iter_values = iter(values)
    try:
        previous_value = next(iter_values)
    except StopIteration:
        return
    first = True
    for value in iter_values:
        yield first, False, previous_value
        first = False
        previous_value = value
    yield first, True, previous_value
'''
syntax = Syntax(my_code, "python", theme="monokai", line_numbers=True)
console = Console()
console.print(syntax)
```



![syntax](https://github.com/textualize/rich/raw/master/imgs/syntax.png)

</details>

- [ansible/ansible-lint](https://github.com/ansible/ansible-lint) Ansible-lint checks playbooks for practices and behaviour that could potentially be improved

## Security contact information

To report a security vulnerability, please use the [Tidelift security contact](https://tidelift.com/security). Tidelift will coordinate the fix and disclosure.

files.name: asv.conf.json
files.content:
{
  "version": 1,
  "project": "rich",
  "project_url": "https://github.com/Textualize/rich",
  "repo": ".",
  "repo_subdir": "",
  "install_command": [
    "in-dir={env_dir} python -mpip install {wheel_file}"
  ],
  "uninstall_command": [
    "return-code=any python -mpip uninstall -y {project}"
  ],
  "build_command": [
    "pip install poetry",
    "python setup.py build",
    "PIP_NO_BUILD_ISOLATION=false python -mpip wheel --no-deps --no-index -w {build_cache_dir} {build_dir}"
  ],
  "branches": [
    "master"
  ],
  "html_dir": "./benchmarks/html",
  "results_dir": "./benchmarks/results",
  "env_dir": "./benchmarks/env",
  "dvcs": "git",
  "environment_type": "virtualenv",
  "install_timeout": 180,
  "show_commit_url": "http://github.com/Textualize/rich/commit/",
  "pythons": [
    "3.10"
  ],
  "matrix": {
    "setuptools": ["59.2.0"]
  }
}

files.name: make.bat
files.content:
@ECHO OFF

pushd %~dp0

REM Command file for Sphinx documentation

if "%SPHINXBUILD%" == "" (
	set SPHINXBUILD=sphinx-build
)
set SOURCEDIR=source
set BUILDDIR=build

if "%1" == "" goto help

%SPHINXBUILD% >NUL 2>NUL
if errorlevel 9009 (
	echo.
	echo.The 'sphinx-build' command was not found. Make sure you have Sphinx
	echo.installed, then set the SPHINXBUILD environment variable to point
	echo.to the full path of the 'sphinx-build' executable. Alternatively you
	echo.may add the Sphinx directory to PATH.
	echo.
	echo.If you don't have Sphinx installed, grab it from
	echo.http://sphinx-doc.org/
	exit /b 1
)

%SPHINXBUILD% -M %1 %SOURCEDIR% %BUILDDIR% %SPHINXOPTS% %O%
goto end

:help
%SPHINXBUILD% -M help %SOURCEDIR% %BUILDDIR% %SPHINXOPTS% %O%

:end
popd

files.name: pyproject.toml
files.content:
[tool.poetry]
name = "rich"
homepage = "https://github.com/Textualize/rich"
documentation = "https://rich.readthedocs.io/en/latest/"
version = "13.9.4"
description = "Render rich text, tables, progress bars, syntax highlighting, markdown and more to the terminal"
authors = ["Will McGugan <willmcgugan@gmail.com>"]
license = "MIT"
readme = "README.md"
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 5 - Production/Stable",
    "Environment :: Console",
    "Framework :: IPython",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows",
    "Operating System :: MacOS",
    "Operating System :: POSIX :: Linux",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.8",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.12",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.13",
    "Typing :: Typed",
]
include = ["rich/py.typed"]


[tool.poetry.dependencies]
python = ">=3.8.0"
typing-extensions = { version = ">=4.0.0, <5.0", python = "<3.11" }
pygments = "^2.13.0"
ipywidgets = { version = ">=7.5.1,<9", optional = true }
markdown-it-py = ">=2.2.0"

[tool.poetry.extras]
jupyter = ["ipywidgets"]

[tool.poetry.dev-dependencies]
pytest = "^7.0.0"
black = "^22.6"
mypy = "^1.11"
pytest-cov = "^3.0.0"
attrs = "^21.4.0"
pre-commit = "^2.17.0"
asv = "^0.5.1"

[build-system]
requires = ["poetry-core>=1.0.0"]
build-backend = "poetry.core.masonry.api"


[tool.mypy]
files = ["rich"]
show_error_codes = true
strict = true
enable_error_code = ["ignore-without-code", "redundant-expr", "truthy-bool"]


[[tool.mypy.overrides]]
module = ["pygments.*", "IPython.*", "ipywidgets.*"]
ignore_missing_imports = true


[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]

[tool.isort]
profile = "black"

files.name: setup.py
tox.ini
files.content:
[tox]
minversion = 4.0.0
envlist =
    lint
    docs
    py{38,39,310,311,312,313}
isolated_build = True

[testenv]
description = Run unit-testing
deps =
    poetry
# do not put * in passenv as it may break builds due to reduced isolation
passenv =
    CI
    GITHUB_*
    HOME
    PYTEST_*
    SSH_AUTH_SOCK
    TERM
setenv =
    PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1
    PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1
commands =
    poetry install
    pytest --cov-report term-missing --cov=rich tests/ {posargs}

[testenv:lint]
description = Runs all linting tasks
commands_pre =
    poetry install -vv --with lint
commands =
    ; poetry install --only dev
    # as long GHA pipelines are not configured to use tox, we should call
    # `make` in order to make testing similar and prevent divergence.
    make format-check
    make typecheck
deps =
    poetry
skip_install = true
allowlist_externals =
    make
    poetry

[testenv:docs]
description = Builds documentation
changedir = docs
deps =
    -r docs/requirements.txt
commands =
    sphinx-build -M html source build
